description.narrative: Output 1.4: Alternative education system for most vulnerable children established and operational, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Access To Quality Learning Opportunities (Covid), Education â€“ General, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: OUTCOME 1: Inclusive equitable and quality social services for children (and adolescents), especially the disadvantaged and vulnerable are improved by 2020

System strengthening - responsiveness of education/training system to the labour market

description.narrative: UNICEF Maldives Country Office;made;adolescent skills and employability;a top priority in the country programme;2022–2026;and obtained consensus;on;introduced design thinking methodology through the;UNICEF;UPSHIFT model for skills development.;A;high-level;steering committee;of 25;was established to oversee operationalization of the model and the committee was oriented;on the model.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/01/2022
